name: WF 76 77 - ADD - chat to client ticket and payment

parameters.text: =Please friend the customer on Facebook and send the customer a message: https://worksuite.cloodo.com/apps/clients/detail/{{ $('is not empty facebook').item.json.data.id }}

additionalFields.taskDescription:
=Please check client's information in this link: https://worksuite.cloodo.com/apps/clients/detail/{{ $('If4').item.json.data.user.id }}  and check whether this client had a project or not. 

If not, please create a corresponding project for this client. 

The project's name must be created according to the specific project of this client. 

In case AM lack of information about client's project, the project's name follows this syntax: Client's Website Domain - Client's Name (ex: abc.com - Jay Lin)

additionalFields.search: =Hi {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.data.added_by.name }}, please take care client[{{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.data.user.email }}]
=Hey Nguyen Thi Dao payment INV#35373 doesn't have a contract file in the project "Brain Hauser- more with print"

additionalFields.taskDescription: =Please check this project Click here and correct 1 milestone and task project
